frontmatter.title: Do online proctoring tools ensure students' privacy and fair-treatment?
frontmatter.description: A paper I wrote for my Computer Ethics Class about remote exams and the tools used to monitor students' behavior, pondering whether this kind of software poses a threat to student privacy and equal conditions. It is not particularly long, but I woudln't say it's short either.
